questions.question: Which of the following statements could be true for a non-standard American option?

choices.answer: The strike price does not change over the life of the option
Early exercise is allowed during the whole life of the option
None of the above
Is exercisable only on specific dates

questions.question: Choose the one that is wrong. The characteristics of compound options are:

choices.answer: Have three exercise dates
The underlying asset is an option
Have two strike prices
Can be valued analytically in terms of the bivariate normal distribution

imageMetadata.altText: Team brainstorming, high angle view on the table

questions.question: A way to get a regular European Option through Binary options is:

choices.answer: Long position in an asset-nothing call and short in an asset-nothing put
Long position in an asset-nothing put and short position in a cash-noth put
Long position in a cash-nothing put and short position in an asset-noth cal
Long position in an asset-nothing call and short in a cash on nothing call

questions.question: An Asian option is a term used to describe which of the following:

choices.answer: An option where the payoff depends on whether a barrier is hit
An option where the payoff depends on the average value of a var. over time
An option that trades on an exchange in the far east
Any option with a nonstandard payoff

questions.question: In an Exchange Option, we want the correlation (ùúå) between the two assets to:

choices.answer: Increase
The correlation doesn't affect Exchange Options
Decrease
Equal 0
